name: Space Jumper (winterdreams)
description:
Opened his eyes for a casual day. But the world seemed upside down. He was shocked by the scene of the sky, the sun turned black. He read about the things happening in the world from a newspaper. At the very moment, he saw that the last alive thing in the world was leaving it, Starship 2415. He has no time left to waste! Suited up and started to go after the spacecraft.

(This game has made for the Blossom Game Jam hosted by ITU Game Design and Development Club)

-Controls-

Jump = Space

Suicide = Esc

-Musics-

Daft Punk - Veridis Quo 8bit (Cover)

GOJIRA - Flying Whales [8-BIT]
